TextLibrary.Text: A blizzard is approaching. I have seen these storms before. We must turn back.
A blizzard is approaching. I have seen these storms before. We must turn back.
A blizzard is approaching. I have seen these storms before. We must turn back.
A blizzard is approaching. I have seen these storms before. We must turn back.
If we turn back, how will we catch up with Bane?
If we turn back, how will we catch up with Bane?
If we turn back, how will we catch up with Bane?
If we turn back, how will we catch up with Bane?
I do not know. Perhaps Tauron can show us another way into the Realms of Death. All I do know is that we may be able to defeat Lord Bane's servants, but we cannot defeat the weather.

Alright... we'll turn back. Bane wins this round. He has kept us out, but at least he won't be able to take slaves and metal through this pass to his citadel anymore. Let's head back to Ohtar.
